data.title: Prime Minister Thaçi sends his condolences to his Finnish counterpart, Matti Vanhanen – Zyra e Kryeministrit
data.text:
Prishtina, 31 December 2009

The following is the Prime Minister’s letter of condolences.

Honorable Prime Minister Vanhanen,

It was with deep sorrow that we received the news on the serious crime committed by a citizen of Kosovar origin, who took the lives of 5 innocent citizens of Finland.

On behalf of the Government of the Republic of Kosovo and on my personal behalf, I express my sincerest condolences to you, your Government, the Finnish people, and particularly to the families of the victims.

During these difficult moments, the people and institutions of Kosovo stand by you in sharing this deep sorrow.

Hashim Thaçi

Prime Minister of the Republic of Kosovo

Last modified: July 31, 2022
